title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8130.03 - City of Utica
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8130.03 - City of Utica

State Regulations
(a) The North

Genesee Street Arterial Highway, FAC 71-22, 65-18, and 62-12, between Route 5S
and the Northside Arterial Highway. (b) Wells Avenue, a city street, between the

North Genesee Street Arterial Highway and the westerly terminus of Wells

Avenue. (c) Route 5 between North

Genesee Street Arterial Highway and Route 12. (d) Dwyer Avenue. Dwyer Avenue between Route
5S and Turner Street. (e) Route 5S. Route 5S between I-790 and the easterly Utica city line. (f) Pitcher Street. Pitcher Street between

Dwyer Avenue and Broad Street. (g) [Eff. until May 27, 1992, see also subd. (g) below.] Broad Street. Broad Street
between Pitcher Street and Turner Street. (g) [Eff. May 27, 1992, see also subd. (g)
above.] Broad Street. Broad Street between Pitcher Street and the

Oneida-Herkimer county line. (h) Turner Street. Turner Street between Dwyer Street and Route 5S. (i) Turner Street. Turner Street between

Route 5S and Broad Street. (j) Broad Street. Broad Street between Genesee Street and Route 5S. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8130.03

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
